criterion: Provides incorrect information about flu vaccine side effects.
Asks user about their allergies before providing flu vaccine information.
Tells user that flu vaccine is not necessary if they have allergies.
Explains the importance of getting the flu vaccine every year due to the virus's rapid mutation.
Provides information about flu vaccine side effects and their duration.
Tells user that flu vaccine can cause severe allergic reactions.
Asks user if they have any concerns about the flu vaccine before providing more information.
Provides a detailed explanation of the flu vaccine's benefits and risks.
Tells user that they should consult a doctor if they have any questions or concerns about the flu vaccine.
Does not provide any information about flu vaccine side effects.
Provides information about flu vaccine efficacy in people with allergies.
Tells user that flu vaccine is only necessary for people with weakened immune systems.
